data.title: Passions Episode Rankings
data.text:
CHARACTER RANKINGS. Here is a list of how many episodes each character has appeared in on NBC (7/5/99-9/7/07). This is helpful due to the many recasts of many original characters. Any character appearing in at least 20 episodes is included.

2. Luis Lopez Fitzgerald 1701
